title: "Confidence Intervals lab"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
options(scipen = 999)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```
```{r}
sale_price <- read_csv("data/ames.csv") %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  select(sale_price)

sale_price
```
```{r}

ggplot(sale_price) +
  aes(x = sale_price) + 
  geom_histogram(col = "white")
```
```{r}
mean_sale_price <- sale_price %>%
  summarise(mean_sale_price = mean(sale_price), median_sale_price = median(sale_price))
mean_sale_price
```
```{r}
library(infer)
```

```{r}
sample_100 <- sale_price %>%
  rep_sample_n(size = 100, reps = 1000, replace = TRUE)
sample_100
```
```{r}
bootstrap_sample_100 <- sample_100 %>%
  specify(response = sale_price) %>%
  generate(reps = 1000, type = "bootstrap") %>%
  calculate(stat = "mean") %>%
  mutate(get_ci(level = 0.95, type = "percentile"))
bootstrap_sample_100
```
```{r}
row_100_ci <- bootstrap_sample_100 %>%
  get_ci(level = 0.95, type = "percentile")
row_100_ci
```
